title: Thanks for touring with us!
body: That brings us to the end of our tour. Thank you for joining me on this adventure. I hope these stories brought the past to life and gave you something new to look for as you explore the city. Please review and rate the tour. your feedback is super valuable. Sharing your experience with friends if you like it. This tour is powered by Uturo, and weâ€™ve got more tours if you want to explore. Hope to see you again soon!
